actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A joint resolution making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, for the Department of Education.

summary.text: Makes a supplemental appropriation for FY 1982 for the Department of Education for student loan insurance under part B (Federal, State, and Private Programs of Low-Interest Insured Loans to Students in Institutions of Higher Education) of title IV of the Higher Education Act.

titles.title: A joint resolution making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, for the Department of Education.
